description: An easy and moreish treat that's adaptable.
name: Simple Veggie Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grate or julienne the zucchinis and pop onto a clean cloth. Wring/squeeze the water out. Put dried zucchini in large mixing bowl.
Julienne/grate the sweet potato and add to bowl.
Drain the corn and add to bowl.
Finely dice or grate the garlic and add to bowl.
Crack 2 eggs into a small bowl and whisk. Add to mix in large bowl.
Add 3/4 to 1 cup of plain flour to bowl. Combine well.
Heat a frypan over med-high heat and add 1-2 tbs of oil (more if you're prefer your fritters crispier). Spoon about 1/2 cup mix into oil and flatten with spoon.
Let mix cook until bottom edges starts to brown. It's important to let the bottom crisp up before flipping. Flip to cook other side.
Remove from pan and rest on kitchen paper to absorb excess oil. Season with salt/pepper. Enjoy on their own or lovely with some mushy avocado.
